actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act so as to provide, for a one-year period, further Federal financial participation in State programs carried out pursuant to plans approved under such part.

summary.text: Amends the program of Aid to Families with Dependent Children of Title IV of the Social Security Act to increase, according to a specified formula, Federal financial participation in State approved programs under such Title during the one year period beginning after September 30, 1977.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act so as to provide, for a one-year period, further Federal financial participation in State programs carried out pursuant to plans approved under such part.
